alert.note: Alert for Copiah; Simpson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 07 at 9:17PM CST until February 11 at 2:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River Near Columbia affecting Marion County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River Near Rockport affecting Copiah and Simpson Counties. Pearl River Near Monticello affecting Lawrence County. For the Lower Pearl River ...including D`lo, Rockport, Monticello, Columbia...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River Near Rockport. * WHEN...Until early Saturday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 PM CST Tuesday the stage was 26.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Friday morning. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. - && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Pearl River Rockport 25.0 26.0 Tue 8 pm CST 25.8 25.3 24.1 &&
info.instruction: Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning at 915 AM CST.
